welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chicago, the charming city known for its breathtaking skyline, deep-dish pizza, and vibrant culture. Get ready to explore and enjoy all that this iconic city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Puerto Rico Food and Liquors
restaurants.description: Puerto Rico Food and Liquors is a deli located in Chicago.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Midway Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the network for free by accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is home to various international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal houses check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is dedicated to domestic flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and has duty-free shops and lounges.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
